suggestions:
No Contact. Neither the Receiving Party nor any of its Representatives will, directly or indirectly, initiate, cause to be initiated, or continue any (a) communication concerning the Confidential Information; (b) requests for meetings with management of the Disclosing Party or its affiliates or subsidiaries in connection with the Transaction; or (c) other communication (including customer or vendor calls) relating to the Disclosing Party or its affiliates or subsidiaries (other than in the ordinary course of business independent of the Transaction) or the Transaction, in each case with any customer, supplier, vendor, officer or employee of the Disclosing Party, or any of the Disclosing Party’s other representatives who has not been designated in writing by the Disclosing Party as a participant in discussions or due diligence. Unless otherwise specified in writing by the Disclosing Party, any requests for Confidential Information, meetings or discussions relating to the Transaction should be directed to __________.

No Warranties. The Receiving Party acknowledges that the Disclosing Party provides the Confidential Information on an "as is" basis, and that none of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives (i) makes any express or implied representation or warranty as to the completeness or accuracy of the Confidential Information, and (ii) will have any liability whatsoever to the Receiving Party or any of its Representatives relating to or arising from their review or use of the Confidential Information. This Agreement does not constitute or create any obligation of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives to provide any Confidential Information or other information to the Receiving Party or its Representatives. Further, none of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives shall have any obligation to update any Confidential Information provided to the Receiving Party and its Representatives hereunder.
originalTexts:
No Contact. Neither the Receiving Party nor any of its Representatives will, directly or indirectly, initiate, cause to be initiated, or continue any (a) communication concerning the Confidential Information; (b) requests for meetings with management of the Disclosing Party or its affiliates or subsidiaries in connection with the Transaction; or (c) other communication (including customer or vendor calls) relating to the Disclosing Party or its affiliates or subsidiaries (other than in the ordinary course of business independent of the Transaction) or the Transaction, in each case with any customer, supplier, vendor, officer or employee of the Disclosing Party, or any of the Disclosing Party’s other representatives who has not been designated in writing by the Disclosing Party as a participant in discussions or due diligence. Unless otherwise specified in writing by the Disclosing Party, any requests for Confidential Information, meetings or discussions relating to the Transaction should be directed to __________.

No Warranties. The Receiving Party acknowledges that none of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives (i) makes any express or implied representation or warranty as to the completeness or accuracy of the Confidential Information, and (ii) will have any liability whatsoever to the Receiving Party or any of its Representatives relating to or arising from their review or use of the Confidential Information. This Agreement does not constitute or create any obligation of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives to provide any Confidential Information or other information to the Receiving Party or its Representatives. Further, none of the Disclosing Party or any of the Disclosing Party’s Representatives shall have any obligation to update any Confidential Information provided to the Receiving Party and its Representatives hereunder.
